website_summaries.verdict: A mid-calf style with zipper accent appreciated for its comfort and warmth and runs small.
pros: Not only do owners love that this boot is warm and cozy, but it also stands out for the zipper, which made it even easier to put these boots on and take them off
Owners love the colors and some made repeat purchases of this style as their children outgrew them
cons: Some felt these boots ran small
sizing up at least one size may be needed
Needs to be waterproofed before use in snow or rain

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I loved these boots. They fit my daughter really well and not too snug. The purple goes well against the grey color of the boots. I think the zipper makes it easier to put the boots on my toddler since they seem to get weak leg syndrome when putting on the boots (ha ha). Some parents know what I’m talking about lol. I bought another pair for my 2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrie P.

customer_reviews.title: make sure to order 2 sizes up.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these a size up from what my toddler was currently in and they are so small i couldnt even get her heel in the boot. I ordered a size 6 and she is size 5 in every other shoe. I wanted to account for all the extra padding but they fit more like a 3-4. they are very well make shoes. i am loyal to the brand when it comes to winter boots but i am going to have to pass these along to my 6 month old niece.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia R.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them!! She’s constantly putting them on and zipping them up! The zipper definitely makes it easy for children to be independent and put their boots on like a big kid! The material is durable, and so far her feet haven’t seemed to get wet when being outside in the rain in them! The inside is soft and comfortable! I’m very happy, especially for the price that I paid!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica.R.

customer_reviews.title: Bearpaw boots ROCK!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my bearpaw boots so much I got two pairs of these - one for my young niece & young cousin, last Christmas. They loved them & got a lot of wear out of them last winter. The only problem is, they’re feet grew out of them, so I may buy them another pair this year. Bearpaw boots are AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Loved the online prices compared to the store
customer_reviews.text: Needed to go up a size for my daughter. Loved the online prices compared to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly W.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable. Warm. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I loved these boots once I figured out how to zip them! There's a flap of leather inside the length of the zipper that gets caught when you first start the zipper EVERY TIME. Once I realized the problem I now just push it out of the way before zipping. These are my daughter's everyday boots this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Chloie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this boots for my daughter. she has narrow feet. They were very difficult to get in, so I changed it to a bigger size. They are very comfortable and warm. She loves them :)
customer_reviews.author: Sonix78

customer_reviews.title: Great warm boot for kids
customer_reviews.text: We love everything Bearpaw. However we have found kids sizes run small. Definitely size up! These are nice and warm and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Warm but bad zipper
customer_reviews.text: These are so warm and cozy but I wish the zipper either worked better or there wasn’t a zipper. The zipper always gets stuck and no way can a toddler zip them on their own. Usually we try to pull them on and off without doing the zipper at all.
customer_reviews.author: Swirl Sisters

customer_reviews.title: ❤
customer_reviews.text: The calf part of the boots are pretty narrow so I have to get a larger shoe size for the calf to fit my daughter. I love bear paw. Her feet are always warm
customer_reviews.author: Kay Free

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is too short for kids boots
customer_reviews.text: Love the leather and the fleece, but the zipper opening is way too short and small for little kids. It was a struggle to put on even though the size was right. Had to send them back
customer_reviews.author: Kicsinycsillag

customer_reviews.title: They are cute but wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these boots. They are warm, cute and comfy. The zipper does not stay up however so they are constantly unzipped. Also, the zipper handle gets crooked and stuck that way which makes it hard for her to zip back herself. I wouldn't buy them again, but they work. Not terribly expensive, cute and warm but cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: PeachtreePeeps

customer_reviews.title: Feels like they are some really well made boots
customer_reviews.text: Feels like they are some really well made boots ! Very Good for the price, I got them as a gift for my niece hopes she likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby logan

customer_reviews.title: Zipper Sticks
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very cute and seem to be warm but the zipper is a huge hassle. It is not smooth and takes time to zip up every time my daughter puts the boots on. If the zipper worked better, I'd give these boots a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Just Cat

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Great for my daughter who is super particular about her shoes/how they fit.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: They are cute, however are a battle to get on my 4 yr old grand, and the zipper sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie E. Chivell

customer_reviews.title: Good price and very good quality
customer_reviews.text: They fit my little girl she is size 10 en shoes but a 11 works very good and fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Both zippers are messed up.  Strange!
customer_reviews.text: We noticed one problem with these boots...the zippers are both messed up. They are crooked and that makes them hard to zip up. So we think that these boots were part of a defective batch.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: LOVE BEAR PAWS!
customer_reviews.text: These are theeee best!!! Not as pricey as UGGs but same quality and warmth. Perfect for winter. Keep feet warm and not sweaty. I sprayed mine with suede boot protector.
customer_reviews.author: yana teleshevsky

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot"s
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my granddaughter and she loves them. They fit well and looks really good on her. They arrived on time as well. I will definetly order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Samiyahstuff

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots lasted my daughter all winter! She pretty much wore them everyday. Will buy a new pair next year as her feet are growing!
customer_reviews.author: Ajd

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Sent back the first one that was a size too small. Replacing a pair that soles wore out. My 6 year old wears these 4 days a week.
customer_reviews.author: 94eagle

customer_reviews.title: Love the contrast of the soles.
customer_reviews.text: Love the contrast on the bottom. These are perfect for a 4 year old toddler and they look as good as Ugg for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Cute boots
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased these for my daughter to fit over orthotics but they're on the narrow side. They fit her foot without them so we're keeping them because they are really cute and will be a nice break from braces in the winter!
customer_reviews.author: Deborrah M Hussey

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: This boot didn’t fit my 6 year old, there were difficult to get on, and not true to size. We returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin D

customer_reviews.title: awesome boot
customer_reviews.text: fits great, and the color was the same as picture
customer_reviews.author: Tamika Latham

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in a size 9 for my daughter she typically wears a nine and they were very small. I ordered a 10 and they fit her much better.
customer_reviews.author: jenglen11

customer_reviews.title: My daughter and I love these
customer_reviews.text: I buy these every year or so for my daughter. She is still growing but they are so comfort for her and very affordable for me.
customer_reviews.author: C. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good boots for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter, she loves them and wears them fairly often. They fit well and are holding up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Markiw

customer_reviews.title: ... zipper so probably won’t have many more wears kinda sucks for how much they are
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wore a few times its starting to thread around the zipper so probably won’t have many more wears kinda sucks for how much they are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute boots for my daughter, I got them a size up and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cutest little boots! Great quality. Only complaint is the zipper, it can be tricky
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but fit is off
customer_reviews.text: The zip opening does not go all the way down making it very hard to get my daughter s foot in. I will be returning the boots.
customer_reviews.author: Boo

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality and I love the look of them! The zipper on the side makes putting them on your child easy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Cozy
customer_reviews.text: These loosen up a little after some wear, making it easier to get little feet in!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Segall

customer_reviews.title: Runs small!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and great color, but way too small... couldn’t get them on even with the zipper. Disappointing as I love the bear paw brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worst experience for my 1 1/2 year old toddler
customer_reviews.text: These are not ideal for a toddler with chubby feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin N.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these, me and my daughter got matching pairs. Love love love worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: GEYSHA

customer_reviews.title: Zippers are cheap
customer_reviews.text: The zippers come down ALOT when my niece wears them. She loves the way they feel inside but the zippers SUCK!
customer_reviews.author: Vashti

customer_reviews.title: Cute for toddler too
customer_reviews.text: These boots are priced the best on Amazon. Great for winter wear. Stylish w jeans and dresses. Fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P DIAZ

customer_reviews.title: A++++
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so cute and comfy, and my daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bearpaw joy
customer_reviews.text: Fits comfortably and gives good support for children. Practical for year round wear and the kids love them. This is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Perreco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved them and especially the "chocolate" color!! very toasty warm for little feet.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut100

product_meta.title: BEARPAW Kids' Emma Toddler Zipper Mid Calf Boot
product_meta.description:
Suede boot with side zipper for each entry

Bearpaw Footwear is made for comfort with contemporary style. Our footwear is made from quality materials that provide an organic beauty that's wearable year round.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately mid-calf from arch
